titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to ban the importation of firearms that have been cosmetically altered to avoid the ban on semiautomatic assault weapons.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 10/22/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to prohibit the importation of cosmetically altered semiautomatic assault weapons.
